data.title: Persia Games
data.meta_description: Persia is the former name of Iran and was the largest empire of the ancient world. Much of the events in the Prince of Persia games take place here.
data.text:
Total War: Rome II

September 3, 2013

MAC

PC

LIN

The successor to the acclaimed Rome: Total War and the eighth main entry in the Total War series, Total War: Rome II returns the series to classical antiquity.

Age of Empires Online

August 16, 2011

PC

One of the best-selling real time strategy franchises returns with Age of Empires Online, Microsoft's first title to utilize a free-to-play model. The game is no longer playable, as its servers were shut down in July 2014.

Garshasp: The Monster Slayer

May 9, 2011

PC

Developed in Iran using mostly free software, Garshasp: The Monster Slayer is an action-adventure game in the vein of the God of War series.

Prince of Persia Trilogy

November 19, 2010

PS3

PS3N

HD remaster of the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time trilogy. Contains The Sands of Time, Warrior Within, and The Two Thrones.

Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands

May 18, 2010

PSP

X360

+ 6 more

PS3

Wii

DS

XBGS

PS3N

PC

Ubisoft returns to the Sands of Time universe for a fourth time in this May 2010 release, set in between the first two games in the trilogy and coinciding with the release of the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time movie.

Empire: Total War

March 3, 2009

MAC

PC

LIN

The fifth installment in the Total War series from The Creative Assembly. Empire: Total War features the series' hallmark blend of real-time strategic battles, and turn-based empire building. Empire takes place during the 18th century â€” an age of imperial expansion, trade, rifles and cannons.

Prince of Persia: The Fallen King

December 2, 2008

DS

A Prince of Persia game exclusive to the DS. Players control the Prince with the stylus in a 2-D action-platformer.

Prince of Persia

December 2, 2008

MAC

X360

+ 4 more

PS3

XBGS

PS3N

PC

A 2008 entry into the Prince of Persia franchise titled simply "Prince of Persia", this game stars an all-new Prince as he teams up with the mysterious Elika to fight Ahriman and cleanse the world of his corruption.

Prince of Persia Classic

June 13, 2007

XBGS

PS3N

+ 2 more

IPHN

ANDR

A remake of the first Prince of Persia, the player controls the Prince as he attempts to save the Princess from the evil Vizier Jaffar.

Ancient Wars: Sparta

April 21, 2007

PC

Ancient Wars: Sparta is a real-time strategy game developed by Russian World Forge. It was lauded for it's graphics but criticized for it's punishing difficulty.

Prince of Persia: Rival Swords

April 3, 2007

PSP

Wii

Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones was later ported to the PSP and Wii. The result was titled Prince of Persia: Rival Swords. Motion controls added by the Wii version is the primary differentiation between the port and the original game.

Sonic and the Secret Rings

February 20, 2007

Wii

The first in Sega's "Sonic Storybook" duology of Sonic the Hedgehog spin-off titles, this game follows the titular hedgehog's race against time in the tales of Arabian Nights as he collects the seven World Rings before a genie's curse ends his life. Known as the series's first take on the use of motion controls.

Battles of Prince of Persia

December 6, 2005

DS

Battles of Prince of Persia is a turn-based strategy game for the Nintendo DS. Its story takes place between Sands of Time and Warrior Within, explaining how the Dahaka first began pursuing the Prince and what measures the Prince took to avoid his fate.

Prince of Persia: Revelations

December 5, 2005

PSP

PSPN

Prince of Persia: Revelations is a port of 2004's Warrior Within for the PlayStation Portable, with 3 additional areas not found in the original game.

Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones

December 1, 2005

MAC

PS2

+ 4 more

GCN

XBOX

PS3N

PC

The Two Thrones is the third game and supposed end for the Sands Of Time saga. It follows the Prince's quest to finish the corrupted, power-hungry Vizier and his negative parts of his mind.

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within

November 30, 2004

PS2

GCN

+ 4 more

XBOX

PS3N

PC

IPHN

Prince of Persia: Warrior Within is the the second game in the Sands of Time series. Adopting a much darker tone, Warrior Within follows the Prince to the Island of Time as he attempts to change the past in order to end the Dahaka's relentless pursuit.

Sid Meier's Civilization III: Conquests

November 4, 2003

PC

The second and final expansion of Civilization III with the inclusion of nine unique scenarios for even more added longevity.

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time

October 28, 2003

GBA

PS2

+ 5 more

GCN

XBOX

XBGS

PS3N

PC

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time is an action-adventure game with a heavy focus on platforming. The story revolves around the wry Prince, a time-altering dagger, and a kingdom beset by a plague-like evil.

Age of Empires II: The Conquerors

August 24, 2000

MAC

PC

Control 5 new civilizations, and take on 4 new campaigns along with a myriad of new units and features in this expansion pack to Age of Kings.
